title: Supervised Learning
content:
Foundational Algorithms from CS229

  • Linear Models: Linear and logistic regression with regularization
  • Support Vector Machines: Maximum margin classification
  • Ensemble Methods: Boosting, bagging, random forests

Theoretical Guarantees (HUJI Book)

  • Consistency: Convergence properties of learning algorithms
  • Generalization Bounds: PAC learning frameworks
  • Stability Analysis: Algorithm stability and generalization

Advanced Methods from Your Paper Collection

Implementation and analysis of state-of-the-art supervised learning approaches from your reading list.
